generalInfo:
Experience the warm hospitality of remote Kyrgyzstan on a journey through rural villages and wild landscapes. Begin in the bustling capital of Bishkek and barter in Osh Bazaar. Marvel at picturesque views across the Ala Archa Gorge, hike through a blend wild and pastoral landscapes in Chon-Kemin Valley, and marvel at the alpine Issy Kul Lake.

Behold the celestial heights of the Tian Shan mountains, before discovering the ancient traditions of felt- and yurt-making, as well as eagle training. Take in Karakolâ€™s 19th-century Russian architecture, walk amongst the prehistoric petroglyphs of Cholpan Ata and stop for a rest at Tash-Rabat caravanserai, a key Silk Road staging post. End your journey in the colourful bazaars of Osh, against the beautiful backdrop of the Sulaiman-Too Sacred Mountains.

TOUR HIGHLIGHTS
Sublime beauty of Issy Kul Lake
Prehistoric art of Cholpan Ata
Remarkable rock formations at Jety-Oguz gorge
Eagle Hunting of Bokonbaevo
Yurt-making in Kyzyl Tuu
Ancient caravansarai of Tash-Rabat
Traditional felt workshop of Kochkor
Natural tranquillity of Chon Kemin valley

PLACESS VISITED
Bishkek - Issy Kul Lake - Cholpan Ata - Reina Kench Farm - Karakol - Skazka canyon - Naryn - Kyzil Tuu - Tash-Rabat - Kochkor - Chon-Kemin valley - Ashu - Ala Archa Gorge

WHAT'S INCLUDED
Arrival & departure transfers
Ground transport with driver
Accommodation
Meals (refer to itinerary for meal plan)
English-speaking guides
Entrance fees to sites & parks

dayInfo.description: On arrival in Bishkek you will be met by a travel representative and transferred to your hotel. After resting, take a tour of Bishkek. Highlights will include a visit to Osh Bazaar and the Eternal Fire (Victory Square). Overnight in Hotel Plaza, Bishkek. Meal plan: Dinner

Drive along the north coast of Issy Kul lake, stopping to see the petrogylphs in Cholpan Ata as well as its ethnographic museum. It is possible to do a yacht ride on Lake Issy Kul here too. Overnight in Hotel Raduga , Cholpan Ata. Meal plan: Breakfast, lunch & dinner

Visit the Nikolai Przhevalskii museum, then continue to Reina Kench farm. Visit the farm and enjoy its ample grounds. Overnight in Guesthouse Reina Kench, Reina Kench Farm. Meal plan: Breakfast, lunch & dinner

Go on a city tour of Karakol and visit the Orthodox Cathedral and Dungan mosque. In the afternoon visit Jety Oguz and take a walk in the picturesque Valley of the Flowers. Overnight in Green Yard Hotel, Karakol. Meal plan: Breakfast, lunch & dinner
Go on an excursion to Altyn Arashan gorge by track or UAZ off-road vehicle. Overnight in Green Yard Hotel, Karakol
Visit Skazka canyon and Tamga gorge. Overnight in Tamga in local guesthouse. Meal plan: Breakfast, lunch & dinner

Drive to Bokonbaevo to meet an eagle trainer and his eagle. Continue on to Kyzil Tuu, here you can learn about how yurts are made (optional activity, not included), before driving to Naryn. Overnight in Khan-Tengri Hotel, Naryn Meal plan: Breakfast, lunch & dinner
Day trip to visit Tash-Rabat. Return for an overnight in Khan-Tengri Hotel, Naryn. Option to stay in a yurt at Tash-Rabat instead is available. Meal plan: Breakfast, lunch & dinner

Drive to Chon Kemin Valley visiting Kochkor en route. Rest of the day free to relax and enjoy the beautiful surroundings. Overnight in Ashu Guesthouse, Chon-Kemin valley. Meal plan: Breakfast, lunch & dinner
Drive to Bishkek, stopping at Burana Tower en route. Overnight in Hotel Plaza, Bishkek. Meal plan: Breakfast, lunch & dinner
Go on an excursion to Ala Archa Gorge, rest of the day free. Overnight in Hotel Plaza, Bishkek. Meal plan: Breakfast, lunch & dinner
At an appropriate time, transfer to the airport for your departure flight home or onward destination. Meal plan: Breakfast
